name: recruiting-timeline
description: Li N. outlines the on-campus recruiting calendar and prep resources.

events.content: When do we start seeing fall recruiting events? Trying to plan mock interviews.
Career fair apps open the first week of September. Companies start info sessions two weeks later and run through mid-October.
ACM mock interviews start the Monday after Week 1â€”sign-ups drop in #career.
Also hit https://careers.calpoly.edu/calendar for RSVP links, and keep your Handshake profile updated before Labor Day.
Appreciate it. Adding those dates to my planner.
